review: I purchased this product solely because I wanted a better way to watch Netflix.  I did have access thru my computer and an older Wii, but I wanted to get HD quality.  For the most part, Apple TV does work fine and is easy to operate.  If you are connected to a cable network, the other uses for this product are unnecessary in my view.  The newly released movie rentals are more expensive than my cable network charge, the other uses are for apps like youtube and internet radio, which again you get with cable.  The one feature that I have used that is useful is Airplay.  That feature allows you to take content from your  home computer or other portable device and show it on your TV.If you want nice quality movies thru Netflix (based on your internet service) I would recommend this product.  It's reliable and not overly expensive.
author: Carmen T. Verenna "cverenna"
